tool_description: An API that spreads global awareness on poverty , by providing the latest news and articles regarding poverty, around the world
name: Global Poverty Awarness
title: Global Poverty Awarness

api_list.name: Individual Poverty News Sources
api_list.description: Obtains News about Poverty from specific news Sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-poverty-awarness.p.rapidapi.com/news/Guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-poverty-awarness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-poverty-awarness.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-poverty-awarness.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Poverty Related Articles Around The World
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all news and articles about poverty around the world
